releaseNotes:
Noty v1.6 - Responsive Design Update

• Responsive UI: Optimized layouts that adapt to any screen size
• Improved Landscape Mode: Better use of screen space in landscape orientation
• Accessibility Enhancements: More consistent text sizing and spacing
• Action Button Placement: Moved primary action buttons to a more accessible location
• Widget Refinements: Enhanced widget appearance on different devices
• Performance Optimizations: Smoother transitions and animations
• Bug Fixes: Resolved minor UI inconsistencies
